title: Bank & Investor-Ready Business Plan Sprint
subtitle: From idea to funding-grade business plan in one intensive day
outcome: A funding-grade business plan with financial projections, market analysis, and investor-ready pitch materials

agenda.title: Welcome & Framework
agenda.details: Introduction to the Vibellion execution framework

agenda.title: Market Analysis & Positioning
agenda.details: Define your market, competitors, and unique value proposition

agenda.title: Business Model & Revenue Streams
agenda.details: Map your business model and revenue projections

agenda.title: Executive Summary & Pitch Outline
agenda.details: Craft investor-ready executive summary and pitch deck structure

agenda.title: Wrap-up & Next Steps
agenda.details: Review deliverables, set follow-up actions, book review sessions

whoItsFor: Entrepreneurs preparing for seed or Series A funding
Teams seeking strategic clarity on their business
whoItsNotFor: Ideas still in concept stage without customer validation
Established businesses with existing funding-grade documentation

facilitator.name: Sarah Chen
facilitator.title: Former VC Associate, 50+ business plans reviewed

faq.question: What if I need more time after the sprint?
faq.answer: All Pro and VIP ticket holders receive a 30-minute follow-up review session within 2 weeks. You can also book additional coaching sessions separately.

faq.question: Do I need to prepare anything beforehand?
faq.answer: Yes, we'll send you a preparation checklist 1 week before the event. You'll need basic financial data, market research notes, and a clear sense of your business model.

faq.question: What's the difference between Standard, Pro, and VIP?
faq.answer: Standard includes the sprint and all templates. Pro adds a 1-on-1 follow-up session and priority support. VIP includes everything in Pro plus 2 additional coaching sessions and direct facilitator access.

faq.question: What is your refund policy?
faq.answer: Full refunds available up to 7 days before the event. 50% refund for cancellations 3-7 days before. No refunds within 3 days of the event.
